info.title: CloudAPI-Admin
info.description: Welcome to the Aries CloudAPI Python project

post.description:
Use a public DID as implicit invitation and connect.

Parameters:
-----------
their_public_did: str
    The public did of the entity you want to connect to

body: CreateConnFromDIDRequest (optional)
    Extra information about the connection request

Returns:
------------
ConnRecord
    The connection record

Accept connection invitation.

Parameters:
------------
invitation: ReceiveInvitationRequest
    the invitation object obtained from create_invitation.

get.description:
Retrieve list of connections.

Returns:
---------
JSON object with “connections” (key), a list of connections (ids)

post.description:
Create and send credential. Automating the entire flow.

get.description:
Get matching credentials for presentation exchange

Parameters:
----------
proof_id: str
     The proof ID

Returns:
--------
presentation_exchange_list: [IndyCredPrecis]
    The list of Indy presentation credentials

Get all proof records

Returns:
--------
presentation_exchange_list: [PresentationExchange]
    The list of presentation exchange records

Get a specific proof record

Parameters:
----------
proof_id: str
    The proof ID

Returns:
--------
presentation_exchange_record: PresentationExchange
    The of presentation exchange record for the proof ID

delete.description:
Delete proofs record for proof_id (pres_ex_id including prepending version hint 'v1-' or 'v2-')

Parameters:
----------
proof_id: str
    The proof ID - starting with v1- or v2-

Returns:
--------
None

get.description:
Get the trust registry.

Returns:
---------
The trust registry with actors and schemas

Retrieve credential definitions the current agent created.

Parameters:
-----------
issuer_did: str (Optional)

credential_definition_id: str (Optional)

schema_id: str (Optional)

schema_issuer_id: str (Optional)

schema_version: str (Optional)


Returns:
---------
The created credential definitions.

get.description:
Get credential definition by id.

Parameters:
-----------

    credential definition id

Retrieve schemas that the current agent created.

Parameters:
-----------
schema_id: str (Optional)
schema_issuer_did: str (Optional)
schema_name: str (Optional)
schema_version: str (Optional)

Returns:
--------
Json response with created schemas from ledger.

schema.title: Response Get Schemas Generic Definitions Schemas Get

------------

get.description:
Retrieve schema by id.

Parameters:
-----------
schema_id: str
    schema id

Returns all webhooks per wallet

This implicitly extracts the wallet ID and return only items
belongign to the wallet.

Returns:
---------
List of webhooks belonging to the wallet

get.summary: Get Webhooks For Wallet By Topic
get.description:
Returns the webhooks per wallet per topic

This implicitly extracts the wallet ID and return only items
belongign to the wallet.

Returns:
---------
List of webhooks belonging to the wallet
